name: Which Pokemon Are you?
description:
I was just working and learning some Unity Api calling stuff then i found Pokemon Api(Free to use) that has all the data(Sprites,Types,Name) of all pokemon generation in json file , so i fetched some useful data i needed for my app on Unity , then i did some search and found something even cool ,a post that calculate a number with your birthday info and your first name and last name initials tbh that post had like some constants from  A-Z .

And Voila i found an idea and put the post into Code and merged it with Api..So basically not making it long i made a simple yet fun app that takes your details like Name, DOB then tells u which Pokemon are u with its no. and type.
